info.title: Advicent.FactFinderService
info.description: An API for accessing the NaviPlan Fact Finder.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Account Types for the specified country.
Purpose: Provides access to the Account Types including id and type description.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country used to filter Account Types

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Account Types for the specified id.
Purpose: Provides access to the Account Types including id and type description.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of Account Type used to retreive the Account Type information

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Accounts for the specified Fact Finder ID and/or external source ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Account information including description and market value.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve Accounts

parameters.name: externalSourceId
parameters.description: The external ID used to filter Accounts

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates an Account.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Accounts on a Fact Finder.

requestBody.description: The Account to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

get.description: Retrieves all holdings in the specified Account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Account used to retrieve the Account Holding data

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

put.description: Updates all holdings associated with an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account with the holding to be updated

requestBody.description: The list of holdings for an account

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

post.description: Creates a holding and adds it to an existing Account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The existing Account ID used to identify which Account to add the holding to

requestBody.description: The holding data

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Account Holding for the specified Account Holding ID and Account ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Account Holding information including description and market value.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Account used to retrieve the Account Holding data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Account Holding used to retrieve the Account Holding data

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

put.description: Updates a holding associated with an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account with the holding to be updated

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the holding to update

requestBody.description: The holding values used to update the current holding

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

delete.description:
Description: This operation deletes a single Account Holding for the specified Account Holding ID and Account ID.
Purpose: Provides the ability to remove individual holdings from a specified Account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Account used to retrieve the Account data that the specified holding belongs to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Account Holding used to delete the Account Holding

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

get.description: Get all of the savings strategies for a specific account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The id of the account to retrieve the savings strategies from

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

post.description: Creates a savings strategy on a specific account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Id of the account to create a savings strategy for

requestBody.description: Values for the strategy to be created

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

delete.description: Deletes all savings strategies tied to an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Id of the account that holds the savings strategies

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

get.description: Get a specific savings strategy for an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The id of the account to retrieve the savings strategies from

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the savings strategy to get

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

put.description: Updates a specific savings strategy

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Id of the account that holds the savings strategy

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the savings strategy to update

requestBody.description: The model with which to update the savings strategy with

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

delete.description: Deletes a specific savings strategy

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Id of the account that holds the savings strategy

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the savings strategy to be deleted

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Account for the specified Account ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Account information including description and market value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Account used to retrieve the Account data

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates an Account, deletes associated saving strategies if the account type changes.
Purpose: Allows for complete replacement of an Account on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Account ID used to identify which Account to update

requestBody.description: The Account to be updated on a Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

delete.description:
Description: The operation removes an Account tied to a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for removal of an Account from a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Account ID used to identify which Account to remove

401.description: Unauthorized for Account data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Account.

post.description:
Description: This operation submits the Fact Finder data to an external system.
Purpose: Allows Fact Finder data to be persisted in another system for that system's consumption and use.

401.description: Unauthorized for Client data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Client.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Critical Illness Insurance Policies for the specified Fact Finder ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Critical Illness Insurance Policies including description and policy type.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve Critical Illness Insurance Policies

401.description: Unauthorized for Critical Illness Insurance Policy data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Critical Illness Insurance Policy.

404.description: Critical Illness Insurance Policy not found.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates a Critical Illness Insurance Policy.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Critical Illness Insurance Policies on a Fact Finder.

requestBody.description: The Critical Illness Insurance Policy to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Critical Illness Insurance Policy data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Critical Illness Insurance Policy.

404.description: Critical Illness Insurance Policy not found.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Critical Illness Insurance Policy for the specified Critical Illness Insurance Policy ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Critical Illness Insurance Policy including description and policy type.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Critical Illness Insurance Policy used to retreive the Critical Illness Insurance Policy

401.description: Unauthorized for Critical Illness Insurance Policy data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Critical Illness Insurance Policy.

404.description: Critical Illness Insurance Policy not found.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates a Critical Illness Insurance Policy.
Purpose: Allows for complete replacement of a Critical Illness Insurance Policy on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Critical Illness Insurance Policy ID used to identify which Critical Illness Insurance Policy to update

requestBody.description: The Critical Illness Insurance Policy to be updated on a Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Critical Illness Insurance Policy data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Critical Illness Insurance Policy.

404.description: Critical Illness Insurance Policy not found.

delete.description:
Description: The operation removes a Critical Illness Insurance Policy tied to a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for removal of a Critical Illness Insurance Policy from a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Critical Illness Insurance Policy ID used to identify which Critical Illness Insurance Policy to remove

401.description: Unauthorized for Critical Illness Insurance Policy data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Critical Illness Insurance Policy.

404.description: Critical Illness Insurance Policy not found.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Critical Illness Insurance Policy Types for the specified country.
Purpose: Provides access to the Critical Illness Insurance Policy Types including id and type description.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country used to filter Critical Illness Insurance Policy Types

404.description: Critical Illness Insurance Policy Type not found.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves the Critical Illness Insurance Policy Type for the specified id.
Purpose: Provides access to the Critical Illness Insurance Policy Types including id and type description.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of Critical Illness Insurance Policy Type used to retreive the Critical Illness Insurance Policy Type information

404.description: Critical Illness Insurance Policy Type not found.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Defined Benefit Pensions for the specified Fact Finder ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Defined Benefit Pensions including description and start date.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve Defined Benefit Pensions

401.description: Unauthorized for Defined Benefit Pension data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Defined Benefit Pension.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates a Defined Benefit Pension.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Defined Benefit Pensions on a Fact Finder.

requestBody.description: The Defined Benefit Pension to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Defined Benefit Pension data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Defined Benefit Pension.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Defined Benefit Pension for the specified Defined Benefit Pension ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Defined Benefit Pension including description and start date.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Defined Benefit Pension used to retreive the Defined Benefit Pension

401.description: Unauthorized for Defined Benefit Pension data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Defined Benefit Pension.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates a Defined Benefit Pension.
Purpose: Allows for complete replacement of a Defined Benefit Pension on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Defined Benefit Pension ID used to identify which Defined Benefit Pension to update

requestBody.description: The Defined Benefit Pension to be updated on a Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Defined Benefit Pension data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Defined Benefit Pension.

delete.description:
Description: The operation removes a Defined Benefit Pension tied to a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for removal of a Defined Benefit Pension from a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Defined Benefit Pension ID used to identify which Defined Benefit Pension to remove

401.description: Unauthorized for Defined Benefit Pension data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Defined Benefit Pension.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Demographic information for the specified Fact Finder ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Demographic information including city and state.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve Demographic information

401.description: Unauthorized for Demographic information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Demographic information.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates Demographic information.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Demographic information on a Fact Finder.

requestBody.description: The Demographic information to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Demographic information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Demographic information.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Dependents for the specified Demographic information ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Dependents including first and last name.

parameters.name: demographicId
parameters.description: The ID of the Demographic information used to retrieve Dependents

401.description: Unauthorized for Demographic information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Demographic information.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates a Dependent.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Dependents on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: demographicId
parameters.description: The ID of the Demographic information to add the Dependent to

requestBody.description: The Dependent to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Dependent information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Dependent information.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Dependent for the specified Dependent ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Dependent including first and last name.

parameters.name: demographicId
parameters.description: The ID of the Demographic information used to retrieve Dependents

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Dependent used to retreive the Dependent

401.description: Unauthorized for Demographic information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Demographic information.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates a Dependent.
Purpose: Allows for complete replacement of a Dependent on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: demographicId
parameters.description: The ID of the Demographic information used to identify which Dependent to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Dependent ID used to identify which Dependent to update

requestBody.description: The Dependent to be updated on a Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Dependent information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Dependent information.

delete.description:
Description: The operation removes a Dependent tied to a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for removal of a Dependent from a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: demographicId
parameters.description: The ID of the Demographic information used to identify which Dependent to remove

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Dependent ID used to identify which Dependent to remove

401.description: Unauthorized for Dependent information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Dependent information.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves Demographic information for the specified Demographic information ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Demographic information including city and state.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Demographic information used to retreive the Demographic information

401.description: Unauthorized for Demographic information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Demographic information.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates Demographic information.
Purpose: Allows for complete replacement of Demographic information on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Demographic information ID used to identify which Demographic information to update

requestBody.description: The Demographic information to be updated on a Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Demographic information data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Demographic information.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Disability Insurance Policy Types for the specified country.
Purpose: Provides access to the Disability Insurance Policy Types including id and type description.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country used to filter Disability Insurance Policy Types

404.description: Disability Insurance Policy Type not found.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Disability Insurance Policy Types for the specified id.
Purpose: Provides access to the Disability Insurance Policy Types including id and type description.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of Disability Insurance Policy Type used to retreive the Disability Insurance Policy Type information

404.description: Disability Insurance Policy Type not found.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Education Goals for the specified Fact Finder ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Education Goals including description and projected cost.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve Education Goals

401.description: Unauthorized for Education Goal data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Education Goal.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates an Education Goal.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Education Goals on a Fact Finder.

requestBody.description: The Education Goal to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Education Goal data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Education Goal.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Education Goal Expenses for the specified Education Goal ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Education Goal Expenses including description and annual cost.

parameters.name: educationGoalId
parameters.description: The ID of the Education Goal used to retrieve Education Goal Expenses

401.description: Unauthorized for Education Goal Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Education Goal Expense.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates an Education Goal Expense.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Education Goal Expenses on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: educationGoalId
parameters.description: The Education Goal ID used to locate the Goal to add the expense to

requestBody.description: The Education Goal Expense to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Education Goal Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Education Goal Expense.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Education Goal Expense for the specified Education Goal Expense ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Education Goal Expense including description and annual cost.

parameters.name: educationGoalId
parameters.description: The ID of the Education Goal used to retrieve Education Goal Expenses

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Education Goal Expense used to retreive the Education Goal Expense

401.description: Unauthorized for Education Goal Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Education Goal Expense.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates an Education Goal Expense.
Purpose: Allows for complete replacement of an Education Goal Expense on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: educationGoalId
parameters.description: The Education Goal ID used to locate the Goal to update the Expense under

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Education Goal Expense ID used to identify which Education Goal Expense to update

requestBody.description: The Education Goal Expense to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Education Goal Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Education Goal Expense.

delete.description:
Description: The operation removes an Education Goal Expense tied to a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for removal of an Education Goal Expense from a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: educationGoalId
parameters.description: The Education Goal ID used to locate the Goal to delete the Expense under

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Education Goal Expense ID used to identify which Education Goal Expense to remove

401.description: Unauthorized for Education Goal Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Education Goal Expense.

Purpose: Provides access to the Education Goal including description and projected cost.

Description: The operation creates an Education Goal Expense.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Education Goal Expenses on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Education Goal ID used to locate the Goal to add the Expense to

requestBody.description: The Education Goal Expense to be added to the Fact Finder

Description: The operation removes an Education Goal tied to a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for removal of an Education Goal from a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Expense Types for the specified country.
Purpose: Provides access to the Expense Types including id and type description.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country used to filter Expense Types

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Expense Types for the specified country.
Purpose: Provides access to the Expense Types including id and type description.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of Expense Type used to retreive the Expense Type information

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Expenses for the specified Fact Finder ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Expenses including description and Expense type.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve Expenses

401.description: Unauthorized for Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Expense.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates an Expense.
Purpose: Allows for creation of Expenses on a Fact Finder.

requestBody.description: The Expense to be added to the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Expense.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Expense for the specified Expense ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Expense including description and Expense type.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Expense used to retreive the Expense

401.description: Unauthorized for Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Expense.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates an Expense.
Purpose: Allows for complete replacement of an Expense on a Fact Finder.

Note: Expense type cannot be changed for expenses prepopulated from NaviPlan.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Expense ID used to identify which Expense to update

requestBody.description: The Expense to be updated on a Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Expense.

delete.description:
Description: The operation removes an Expense tied to a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for removal of an Expense from a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Expense ID used to identify which Expense to remove

401.description: Unauthorized for Expense data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Expense.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Fact Finders for the specified householdId, or if null, all households associated with the user.
Purpose: Provides access to the Fact Finder including status.

parameters.name: householdId
parameters.description: The ID of the household used to retrieve the fact finders. If not set, uses all households associated with the user

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Fact Finder.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates a completely empty draft Fact Finder.
Requirements: A householdId and list of modules must be provided.
Purpose: Stages a Fact Finder for population.

requestBody.description: The Household the Fact Finder will belong to and the modules that are available.

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Fact Finder.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates a new Populated Fact Finder.
Requirements: A householdId and list of modules must be provided.
Purpose: Creation of a Fact Finder.

requestBody.description:
The Household the Fact Finder will belong to and the modules that are available. 
            Optional PlanId to populate from

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Fact Finder.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves all Fact Finder Modules for the specified Fact Finder ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Fact Finder Modules including description and policy type.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve Fact Finder Modules

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder Module data access.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Fact Finder Module for the specified Fact Finder Module ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Fact Finder Module including description and policy type.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve Fact Finder Module

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder Module used to retreive the Fact Finder Module

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder Module data access.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates a Fact Finder Module.
Purpose: Allows for complete replacement of a Fact Finder Module on a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to identify the Fact Finder Module to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Fact Finder Module ID used to identify which Fact Finder Module to update

requestBody.description: The Fact Finder Module to be updated on a Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder Module data access.

get.description:
Description: The operation retrieves Snapshots of a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for advisors to view all Snapshots taken of a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder to retrieve Snapshots for

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Fact Finder.

post.description:
Description: The operation creates a Snapshot of a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for advisors to compare the current fact finder to a snapshot prior to acceptance.

parameters.name: factFinderId
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to create the Fact Finder Snapshot

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Fact Finder.

get.description:
Description: This operation retrieves a single Fact Finder for the specified Fact Finder ID.
Purpose: Provides access to the Fact Finder including status.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder used to retrieve the Fact Finder

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Fact Finder.

put.description:
Description: The operation updates a Fact Finder.
Purpose: Allows for the updating of a Fact Finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Fact Finder ID used to identify which Fact Finder to update

requestBody.description: The Fact Finder to be updated

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Fact Finder.

delete.description:
Description: This operation deletes a single Fact Finder for the specified Fact Finder ID.
Purpose: Deletes the fact finder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Fact Finder to be deleted

401.description: Unauthorized for Fact Finder data access.

403.description: Request is restricted for access to Fact Finder.

put.description:
Description: The operation populates a fact finder.
Purpose: Allows for the population of a Fact Finder based on a NaviPlan plan or client. This operation cannot be performed on a Fact Finder more than once.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The existing Fact Finder ID used to identify which Fact Finder to populate.

requestBody.description: The plan to populate a fact finder from. If not provided, the client id will be inferred.
